greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First column of lower triangular matrix A093654.
comment: Related to the number of tournament sequences (A008934).
a(n) equals the number of tournament sequences (A008934) of length A000120(n-1), which is the number of 1's in the binary expansion of n-1.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 08 2004
